title: Verify Functionality for Video Tray - Single Clip
custom_preconds: Given user navigates to this page and has adblocker turned off
custom_expected:
1. An ad should start playing muted when the page loads
2. After the ad, the video should start playing automatically 
3. When the video is over, a play button should display in the middle of the player 
4. If you click or tap the play button, the video should play an anohter ad and then play again.
5. - On desktop AND mobile, ads should have a countdown timer and a mute/unmute button. Clicking hte body of the video player itself should click through to a sponsored URL.

title: Verify Functionality for Video Tray - Playlist
custom_preconds: Given user navigates to this page
custom_expected:
1. An ad should start playing muted when the page loads
2. After the ad, the video should start playing automatically 
3. When the video is over, there will be a countdown for the next video to start. 
4. If you click "play", an ad will play followed by the next video
5. If you click "replay", an ad will play and then the previous video will play again. 
6. If you let the countdown expire, an ad will play and then the next video in the playlist will play. 
7. The playlist willl keep playing for at least 30 clips.

title: Verify Functionality for Video Module - Autoplay = True
custom_preconds: Given user navigates to this page and autoplay is set to true
custom_expected:
1. Video should start playing when the page loads. there should not be an ad. 
2. When the video is over, a play button should display in the left of the player. 
3. If you click or tap the play button, the video should play again

title: Verify Functionality for Video Module - Autoplay = False
custom_preconds: Given user navigates to this page and autoplay is set to false
custom_expected:
This is for the first video on the page only

1. The first video player on the page should not autoplay on page load. . it should have a play button in the player. 
2. When the user clicks the play button, the video should play. There should not be an ad before the video. 
3. When the video is over, the video player should return to what it looked like before the video played
4. If you click or tap the play button, the video should play again.
